channel.title: Not droped?
channel.description:
i was testing and everything works its just when i kill my friend in wildy or monster kills him or he just dies he doesnt drop his items. he had full inventory and full armour and he kept everything. Normaly you keep 3 items + 1 protection or if skulled just 1 :confused: :confused: :confused:
thanks for help :)
Im not admin or mod.
P.S: who figures out this problem gets credits on forums of this RSPS sooN! ;D
